articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: Doctors face-palm as RFK Jr.’s top vaccine advisor questions need for polio shot - Ars Technica
articles.description: Kirk Milhoan's comments come as federal vaccine policy slides to insignificance.

articles.author: Dan Goodin
articles.title: Why has Microsoft been routing example.com traffic to a company in Japan? - Ars Technica
articles.description: Company's autodiscover caused users' test credentials to be sent outside Microsoft networks.

articles.author: Russell Brandom
articles.title: Anthropic launches interactive Claude apps, including Slack and other workplace tools - TechCrunch
articles.description: Claude users will now be able to call up interactive apps inside the chatbot interface, with Cowork integration coming soon.
articles.content:
Claude users will now be able to call up interactive apps within the chatbot interface, thanks to a new feature announced by Anthropic on Monday.
